text:
AWESOME LOCATION AND HOSTS!
Terri and Ira made our stay wonderful with the attention they pay to every detail. From the snacks, drinks, toiletries and various pillow types, this is on par with a luxury hotel. The house is immaculate with the latest technology: large TV, Apple TV, sound system, own thermostat and super fast wifi. 
The location is perfect if you are looking for activities downtown. Barton Springs is a short walk away, it will probably take you longer to drive and find parking than to walk. UBER is the way to go, we had a 2-3 minute wait time and fare to 6th street were $6, less than parking downtown. 
We can't wait to come back and stay here again!
title: Mid-Century Modern 1BD+ Apartment
